1894305624.description: Object specifying a color map for grass instead of a specific color.

color_map.description: Color map from textures/colormap to determine color of grass.
color_map.title: Grass Colormap

1894305624.title: Grass Color Map

2544684648.description: Set the ambient sounds for the biome. These sounds must be in the 'individual_named_sounds' in a 'sounds.json' file.

addition.description: Named sound that occasionally plays at the listener position

loop.description: Named sound that loops while the listener position is inside the biome

mood.description: Named sound that rarely plays at a nearby air block position when the light level is low. Biomes without an ambient mood sound will use the 'ambient.cave' sound.

2544684648.title: minecraft:ambient_sounds

2660458847.description: Any components that this Client Biome uses

minecraft:ambient_sounds.description: Set the ambient sounds for the biome. These sounds must be in the 'individual_named_sounds' in a 'sounds.json' file.

minecraft:biome_music.description: Affect how music plays within the biome

minecraft:fog_appearance.description: Set the fog settings used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default fog settings.

minecraft:foliage_appearance.description: Set the foliage color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default foliage appearance.

minecraft:grass_appearance.description: Set the grass color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default grass appearance.

minecraft:sky_color.description: Set the sky color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default sky color behavior.

minecraft:water_appearance.description: Set the water surface color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default water surface color behavior.
minecraft:water_appearance.x-runtime-constraint-description: Make sure that at least either the surface color or the opacity is specified

2660458847.title: Client Biome Components

2791086866.description: Object specifying a color map for foliage instead of a specific color.

color_map.description: Color map from textures/colormap to determine color of foliage.
color_map.title: Foliage Colormap

2791086866.title: Foliage Color Map

3072409085.description: Contains non-component settings for a Client Biome.

identifier.description: The name of the Client Biome, used by other features like the '/locate biome' command. Must match the name of a Biome defined by the game or a behavior pack.

3072409085.title: Client Biome Description

3250030827.description: Affect how music plays within the biome

volume_multiplier.description: Multiplier temporarily and gradually applied to music volume when within this biome. Must be a value between 0 and 1, inclusive.

3250030827.title: minecraft:biome_music

4061100221.description: Set the water surface color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default water surface color behavior.

surface_color.description: RGB color of the water surface

surface_opacity.description: Opacity of the water surface (must be between 0 for invisible and 1 for opaque, inclusive)

4061100221.title: minecraft:water_appearance

4147961405.description: Set the foliage color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default foliage appearance.

color.description: RGB color of foliage, or a Foliage Color Map object.

oneOf.description: Object specifying a color map for foliage instead of a specific color.

4147961405.title: minecraft:foliage_appearance

569860384.description: Set the grass color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default grass appearance.

oneOf.description: Object specifying a color map for grass instead of a specific color.

569860384.title: minecraft:grass_appearance

658145120.description: Set the sky color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default sky color behavior.
658145120.title: minecraft:sky_color

783532490.description: Set the fog settings used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default fog settings.

fog_identifier.description: Identifier of fog definition to use

783532490.title: minecraft:fog_appearance

description: Contains a description and components to define a Client Biome.

description.description: Non-component settings, including the Client Biome name.

title: Client Biome Definition
